title: riot please what happend my account got banend for no reason.
body: my account was banned for no reason i wasnt being salty at all or anything i wasnt feeding and people decided to report it and get it banned. can yous please look into my match history and my text in game chat. i have no idea why im banned. i hardly swear on it im even willing to copy and paste what i was saying in game. and it was saying good job to my team. so please look into why this account is banned. im very angry

replies.body:
Hi mum is moist,

You should have received chat logs with your ban. Feel free to share the in-game text here and we can go through it together and explain why the behaviour was not acceptable.

You need to get in touch with [Riot Support](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), they can tell you exactly what happened and send you any logs that you need.

Although since you asked us to take a look at your match history, I have to say the [game where you bought 6 Doran's Rings](https://i.gyazo.com/665f2c28563bc2ed733e4ea8fab314ef.png) 4 minutes before the game ended doesn't look like it was very positive... I'm just speculating though of course, only you and Riot will know what truly happened.
